column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If we didn't have guests in town
column2: we would have left after speaking to his manager about the snarky service. We put our name in
column3: placed our order with the register as instructed and were added to the list which thankfully was updated via a website so we went to Pink Taco for drinks. An hour and 15 minutes later we were sat
column4: then WAITED ANOTHER HOUR AND 15 MINUTES for our pizzas. What was the point in putting in our order ahead of time? Our server
column5: while nice was aloof and did not take good care of us on drinks or time updates. We asked for water several times
column6: refill on beers and iced tea with no luck. Â The pizza is good
column7: do not get me wrong because it is my favorite deep dish in the city. The crust is the secret!
